experiment.title: Illumina HiSeq 4000 paired end sequencing; GSM3557675: old_Dropseq_1; Mus musculus; RNA-Seq

study.title: Multi-modal analysis of the aging mouse lung at cellular resolution
study.abstract: A) Whole lung tissue from 24 months (n=7) and 3 months old (n=8) mice was dissociated and single-cell mRNAseq libraries generated with Drop-Seq. B) Bulk RNA-seq data was generated from whole mouse lung tissue of old (n=3) and young (n=3) samples. C) Bulk RNA-seq data was generated from flow-sorted macrophages from old (n=7) and young (n=5) mice and flow-sorted epithelial cells from old (n=4) and young (n=4) mice. Overall design: Integration of bulk RNA-seq from whole mouse lung tissue and bulk RNA-seq from flow-sorted lung macrophages and epithelial cells was used to validate results obtained from single cell RNA-seq of whole lung tissue.

SRR8426358.title: Illumina HiSeq 4000 paired end sequencing; GSM3557675: old_Dropseq_1; Mus musculus; RNA-Seq
